cards: Would you rather know how you die or when you die?
Would you rather lose all memories or never make new ones?
Would you rather be able to fly or read minds?
Would you rather live without music or without TV (movies, series, etc)?
Would you rather have unlimited money or unlimited time?
Would you rather explore space or the ocean depths?
Would you rather know all languages or play every instrument?
Would you rather travel to the past or the future?
Would you rather be incredibly smart or extremely attractive?
Would you rather live without internet or have to do household chores by hand?
Would you rather have a rewind button or a pause button for life?
Would you rather always say what you think or never speak?
Would you rather change the past or see the future?
Would you rather be invisible or be able to fly?
Would you rather always be 10 minutes late or 20 minutes early?
Would you rather have the ability to teleport or time travel?
Would you rather give up coffee or social media?
Would you rather be able to talk to all reptiles or all insects?
Would you rather have unlimited travel or unlimited food?
Would you rather lose the ability to read or the ability to speak?
Would you rather have free Wi-Fi everywhere or unlimited battery life on all your devices?
Would you rather always have all traffic lights you approach turn green or never have to stand in line again?
Would you rather get $10,000 or your best friend get $100,000?
Would you rather solve world hunger or end all fighting in the world?
Would you rather have a pet dinosaur or a pet dragon?
Would you rather be an unknown superhero or a famous villain?
Would you rather live one year in five different countries or five years in one foreign country?
Would you rather be a character in your favourite TV show or have your favourite show never have existed?
Would you rather have sex with a sheep and no one knows about it or dont but everyone believes you did?
Would you rather publicly expose your partner’s biggest secret or have them expose yours?
Would you rather never have good sex with someone you love or have great sex with someone you don't love?
Would you rather have your past internet history made public or stab someone without getting caught (he would survive)?
Would you rather live in a society with no sexual taboos but no privacy, or full privacy but strict sexual laws?
Would you rather be famous for a scandalous sex tape or for a major business failure?
Would you rather have a job that pays double but requires monthly nude photo shoots, or a job you love that pays half?
Would you rather have telekinesis (the ability to move things with your mind) or telepathy (the ability to read minds)
Would you rather be chronically under-dressed or overdressed?
Would you rather labor under a hot sun or extreme cold?
Would you rather have a personal maid or a personal chef?
Would you rather be royalty 1,000 years ago or an average person today?
Would you rather wear the same socks for a month or the same underwear for a week?
Would you rather be gassy on a first date or your wedding night?
Would you rather walk in on your parents or have them walk in on you?
Would you rather find true love today or win the lottery next year?
Would you rather live a short life full of excitement or a long life of calm routine?
Would you rather live a life where everything you do is recorded and visible, or live in total isolation where no one ever sees you?
Would you rather be desired physically but despised personally, or loved personally but ignored physically?
Would you rather never feel fear but also never feel excitement, or feel everything intensely including fear?
Would you rather have the ability to erase your worst memory by reliving it once or remain as you are?
Would you rather be the creator of an idea that changes the world but die unknown, or be famous your whole life but leave no impact?
Would you rather live a life of constant change and instability or never change and always feel stuck?
Would you rather your child inherit all your worst traits or none of your best traits?
Would you rather feel true empathy for everyone and be overwhelmed or feel little empathy and never suffer for others?
Would you rather give up your body’s pleasures (sex, snacks, comfort) but have total freedom, or keep pleasures and accept major limitations on freedom?
Would you rather have a job you love that destroys your health, or a job you hate that gives you perfect health?
Would you rather lose your capacity to feel shame or lose your capacity to feel guilt?
